Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Prepare a baking sheet by greasing it.

Combine the butter, sugars, and vanilla in a mixing bowl. Mix until well combined before adding the oil. Gradually incorporate the flour mixture into the egg mixture and stir until fully blended; fold in the chocolate chips. Spread the mixture evenly on a greased baking sheet.
Beat together eggs, oil, white sugar, and brown sugar in a bowl until smooth. Mix in pecans, flour, and vanilla. Pour batter into the prepared baking dish.
